snippet.title: Afterschool! Survival Club - Gameplay | Android/iOS
snippet.description:
Please do Subscribe to our Channel For MORE Awesome Gaming Videos: 
https://bit.ly/GameViewTrending

Welcome to the Afterschool Survival Club!

We aim to have fun while surviving the zombie apocalypse!
No matter you're a lonely wanderer or a blood thirsty misfit, you are welcomed.
So come in, meet new friends, and explore the world full of loots.
And most important of all:
Have fun killing zombies!

Additional App information
✅ Category: Free Adventure Game
✅ Requirements: Android 5.1+/iOS 10+
✅ Language: English, Arabic, Armenian, Catalan, Czech, & 27 more...
✅ Battle Control: Manual
✅ Network: Offline
✅ Total Size: 168MB

◊*Thanks for watching do check my other videos you'll find alot of games of you're type to play!💕😍

Game Link
⭕ Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cyberxgames.zombie&hl=en_US&gl=US
⭕ Apk: https://apkcombo.com/afterschool-survival-club/com.cyberxgames.zombie/download/apk
⭕ iOS: https://apps.apple.com/sa/app/afterschool-survive-club/id1532833963
